text: Avane, granthadavarallina dhikkarigalannu prathama uccataneya vele avara manegalinda horadisidavanu. Avaru horaduvarendu nivendu bhavisiralilla. Atta avaru, tam'ma kotegalu tam'mannu allahaninda raksisaballavendu bhavisi kondiddaru. Adare allahanu avarendu uhisillada kadeyinda avara balige bandanu â€“ mattu avara manas'sugalalli bhitiyannu bittidanu. (Idara phalavagi) avaru svatah tam'ma kaigalinda tam'ma nivasagalannu kedavi haka todagidaru. Visvasigala kaigalindalu (adanne madisalayitu). Drstiyullavare, patha kaliyiri
